# Random

> Standard library generic random functions.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var random = require( '@stdlib/math/random' );
```

#### random

Standard library generic random functions.

``` javascript
var rand = random;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var rand = require( '@stdlib/math/random' );

console.log( getKeys( rand ) );
```
